term_definitions.items: Additional contextual detail to be applied to all compositions.

The period of care to which this composition belongs. This equates to the CONTSYS concept and repesents an admisitrative or contractual spell of care, involving a specific instiution or care provider.
The identifier of the departmental period of care to which this Composition belongs.
Portlet ID from which stores the information where was the composition saved.
Calculations related to child growth, generally based on the subject's age.
Age when measurement was calculated, possibly adjusted for pre-term delivery. May be expressed as a conventional age or as a decimal age.
Percentile calculated using standard normal distribution for the given adjusted age.
The z-score of an observation for a given adjusted age. The z-score indicates how many standard deviations the observation is above or below the population mean.
The name of the growth calculation.
The method or algorithm by which the calculation was derived.
A comment on an individual growth calculation.
Calculations for height/length for a given age, adjusted for pre-term delivery.
Calculations for sitting height at a given age, adjusted for pre-term delivery.
Calculations for subischial leg length at a given age, adjusted for pre-term delivery.
Calculations for weight at a given age, adjusted for pre-term delivery.
Calculations for head circumference at a given age, adjusted for pre-term delivery.
Calculations for weight at a given height/length.
Calculations for systolic blood pressure at a given age and height/length, adjusted for pre-term delivery.
Systolic blood pressure for age and height
Calculations for diastolic blood pressure at a given age and height/length, adjusted for pre-term delivery.
Diastolic blood pressure for age and height
A comment on child growth calculations, not captured in other fields.
Calculations for bofy mass index for a given age, adjusted for pre-term delivery.
True if the calculation age has been adjusted for pre-term gestation.
Age is based on date of birth, possibly corrected for gestation.
Age is estimated from bone age measurement.
Measurement of the body weight of an individual.
Description of the state of dress of the person at the time of weighing.
Clothing which may add significantly to weight, including shoes.
Clothing which will not add to weight significantly.
Wearing only a nappy - can add significant weight.
Comment about the measurement of weight.
Record any issues or factors that may impact on the measurement of body weight eg timing in menstrual cycle, timing of recent bowel motion or noting of amputation.
The estimated skeletal age of the subject.
The chronological age of the subject.
The imaging modality used to estimate skeletal age.
The algorithm used to estimate skeletal age.
Additonal comment about the skeletal age.
Height, or body length, is measured from crown of head to sole of foot. Height is measured with the individual in a standing position and body length in a recumbent position.
Any timed measurement of height or body length.
The length of the body from crown of head to sole of foot.
Description of the device used to measure height or body length.
Height is measured standing on both feet with weight distributed evenly, heels together and both buttocks and heels in contact with a vertical back board.
Comment about the measurement of body height/length.
Record any issues or factors that may impact on the measurement of body height/length eg noting of amputation.
Length is measured in a fully extended, recumbent position with the pelvis flat, legs extended and feet flexed.
Calculated measurement which compares a person's weight and height.
Any timed recording of Body Mass Index.
Index describing ratio of weight to height.
The method of entering the Body Mass Index.
Body Mass Index calculated and entered automatically without user intervention.
Body Mass Index calculated and entered directly by user.
Formula used to derive the Body Mass Index.
Comment about the Body Mass Index measurement eg noting that the measurements used were adjusted weight/height.
Height, or body length, is measured from crown of head to sole of foot. Height is measured with the individual in a standing position and body length in a recumbent position.
Height, or body length, is measured from crown of head to the table surface as the subject sits erect.
Any timed measurement of height or body length.
The length of the body from crown of head to sole of foot.
The length of the body from crown to the surface of the table.
Description of the device used to measure height or body length.
Height is measured standing on both feet with weight distributed evenly, heels together and both buttocks and heels in contact with a vertical back board.
Comment about the measurement of body height/length.
Record any issues or factors that may impact on the measurement of body height/length eg noting of amputation.
Length is measured in a fully extended, recumbent position with the pelvis flat, legs extended and feet flexed.
The actual or estimated length of the leg.
The actual or estimated length of the leg.
Method used to measure or estimate leg length. e.g. Direct measurement or derived from Height less Sitting height.
Record any issues or factors that may impact on the estimation of leg length eg contractures.
Additional comment not captured elsewhere about the recording of leg length.
Side of the leg measured. This may only be specificially recorded when leg length discrepancy is suspected.

template_id.value: ISPEK - ZN - Child growth calculation Dialog

term_definitions.items: Acts as a container for a set of archetype which represent a single date-capture screen.
Generic encounter or progress note composition

items.items: Generic encounter or progress note composition
Generic encounter or progress note composition
Acts as a container for a set of archetype which represent a single date-capture screen.
Acts as a container for a set of archetype which represent a single data-capture screen.
Calculations related to child growth, generally based on the subject's age.
Age when measurement was calculated, possibly adjusted for pre-term delivery. May be expressed as a conventional age or as a decimal age.
Percentile calculated using standard normal distribution for the given adjusted age.
The z-score of an observation for a given adjusted age. The z-score indicates how many standard deviations the observation is above or below the population mean.
The name of the growth calculation.
The method or algorithm by which the calculation was derived.
A comment on an individual growth calculation.

Measurement of the body weight of an individual.
Description of the state of dress of the person at the time of weighing.
Clothing which may add significantly to weight, including shoes.
Clothing which will not add to weight significantly.
Wearing only a nappy - can add significant weight.
Comment about the measurement of weight.
Record any issues or factors that may impact on the measurement of body weight eg timing in menstrual cycle, timing of recent bowel motion or noting of amputation.
Naprav s katero se je izvedla meritev
The estimated skeletal age of the subject.
The chronological age of the subject.
The imaging modality used to estimate skeletal age.
The algorithm used to estimate skeletal age.
Additonal comment about the skeletal age.
Kost na kateri je ugotavljana starost
Način na katerega je pridobljena slika kosti na kateri je bila ugotavljana starost
Algoritem, ki je bil uporabljen za oceno straoti kosti
Height, or body length, is measured from crown of head to sole of foot. Height is measured with the individual in a standing position and body length in a recumbent position.
Any timed measurement of height or body length.
The length of the body from crown of head to sole of foot.
Description of the device used to measure height or body length.
Height is measured standing on both feet with weight distributed evenly, heels together and both buttocks and heels in contact with a vertical back board.
Comment about the measurement of body height/length.
Record any issues or factors that may impact on the measurement of body height/length eg noting of amputation.
Length is measured in a fully extended, recumbent position with the pelvis flat, legs extended and feet flexed.
Višina/dolžina pacienta, izmerjena od vrha glave do podplatov na nogah
*Any timed measurement of height or body length.(en)
Višina/dolžina pacienta, izmerjena od vrha glave do podplatov na nogah
Pozicija pacienta, ko se izvaja meritev
Calculated measurement which compares a person's weight and height.
Any timed recording of Body Mass Index.
Index describing ratio of weight to height.
The method of entering the Body Mass Index.
Body Mass Index calculated and entered automatically without user intervention.
Body Mass Index calculated and entered directly by user.
Formula used to derive the Body Mass Index.
Comment about the Body Mass Index measurement eg noting that the measurements used were adjusted weight/height.
*Any timed recording of Body Mass Index.(en)
Height, or body length, is measured from crown of head to sole of foot. Height is measured with the individual in a standing position and body length in a recumbent position.
Height, or body length, is measured from crown of head to the table surface as the subject sits erect.
Any timed measurement of height or body length.
The length of the body from crown of head to sole of foot.
The length of the body from crown to the surface of the table.
Description of the device used to measure height or body length.
Height is measured standing on both feet with weight distributed evenly, heels together and both buttocks and heels in contact with a vertical back board.
Comment about the measurement of body height/length.
Record any issues or factors that may impact on the measurement of body height/length eg noting of amputation.
Length is measured in a fully extended, recumbent position with the pelvis flat, legs extended and feet flexed.
Telesna višina oz. dolžina izmerjena od temena glave do pete na stopalih
Višina kot dolžinska mera med temenom glave in površino na kateri sedi bujekt
*Any timed measurement of height or body length.(en)
Telesna višina oz. dolžina izmerjena od temena glave do pete na stopalih
Višina kot dolžinska mera med temenom glave in površino na kateri sedi bujekt
Podatki o napravi s katero je bila opravljena meritev
Višina je bila izmerjena v stoječem položaju subjekta, z obemi stopali na tleh, enkomerno porazdeljeno težo, peti skupaj, peti in zadnjica ob steni
Opis dejavnikov, ki (lahko) vplivajo na merjenje in izmerjeno vrednost
Dolžina je bila izmerjena v iztegnjenem ležečem položaju z iztegnjenima nogama in pokrčenimi stopali, medenico v vodoravnem položaju
The actual or estimated length of the leg.
The actual or estimated length of the leg.
Method used to measure or estimate leg length. e.g. Direct measurement or derived from Height less Sitting height.
Record any issues or factors that may impact on the estimation of leg length eg contractures.
Additional comment not captured elsewhere about the recording of leg length.
Side of the leg measured. This may only be specificially recorded when leg length discrepancy is suspected.
*The actual or estimated length of the leg.(en)
*The actual or estimated length of the leg.(en)
*Method used to measure or estimate leg length. e.g. Direct measurement or derived from Height less Sitting height.(en)
*Record any issues or factors that may impact on the estimation of leg length eg contractures.(en)
*Additional comment not captured elsewhere about the recording of leg length.(en)
*Side of the leg measured. This may only be specificially recorded when leg length discrepancy is suspected.(en)
